summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3795 for the improvement of Oregon Street from its intersection with the center line (produced south) of Block 34, Maynard's Lake Washington Addition, to 42nd Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by construction of a trunk sewer and subsewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46751, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
